```{r}
#| warning: false
#| message: false
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
# Read and clean the data
x <- readRDS("data/sea_wather.rds") |>
  filter(!is.na(air_temp)) |>
  mutate(day = as.Date(date)) |>
  group_by(day) |>
  summarise(
    tmax_c = max(air_temp, na.rm = TRUE),
    tmax_f = tmax_c * 9 / 5 + 32
  )
```
